name: You're not alone, but i really want to be
name_original: You're not alone, but i really want to be
description:
Game Jam Theme: You're not Alone

(but that's all I wanted to be- Potato)

You're a couch potato that wants to be alone but worldly responsibilities and tasks ruin your precious nap time.

Shoot down all obstacles that come between you and your couch!

With the power of ExcuseBullets™ you can win it all!
